data.title: Georgia Southern University Athletics
data.meta_description:
Chandler Corley (2) INF  - 2018-19 Sun Belt Conference Commissioner's List

AS A JUNIOR (2017)(Armstrong State):Â Started all 48 games for the Pirates as a junior
data.text:
2018-19 Sun Belt Conference Commissioner's List

AS A JUNIOR (2017)(Armstrong State): Started all 48 games for the Pirates as a junior ... Hit .369 with 12 doubles, six home runs and 56 RBI ... Began the season with a 16-game hitting streak ... Went 4-for-5 with a home run and seven RBI in the Pirates' 18-2 win over Salem International on Feb. 18 ... Went 4-for-4 with three doubles and three RBI in a 17-7 win over Davis & Elkins on Feb. 26 ... Went 5-for-8 with two home runs against Albany State on March 28 ... Notched 27 games with two or more hits ... Member of the PBC Presidential Honor Roll.

AS A SOPHOMORE (2016)(Armstrong State): Started all 50 games as a sophomore for the Pirates ... Hit .333 with nine doubles, four triples, four home runs and 34 RBI ... Ranked second in the PBC in triples ... PBC All-Academic Team honoree ... Carried an 11-game hitting streak from April 9-30, hitting .435 during that stretch ... Went 7-for-12 with five RBI in the Pirates' season-ending three-game series at Belmont Abbey on May 6-7 ... Went 3-for-4 with a home run and three RBI in the Pirates' 11-3 win over Morehouse on April 6.

AS A FRESHMAN (2015)(Armstrong State): Played in 27 games, starting 19, for the Pirates as a freshman ... Hit .250 with two doubles, one home run and 10 RBI ... PBC Freshman of the Week (Feb. 24) ... Went 2-for-4 with a home run and three RBI in the Pirates' 14-10 win over Claflin on March 18 ... Went 2-for-3 with two stolen bases and three runs scored against Paine on February 17th.

HIGH SCHOOL: Played for Lakeside HS in Evans, Ga. ... Earned All-Region and All-County honors for the Pantheres ... Lakeside HS captured the region title in 2013 ... 2013 Rawlings Perfect Game and Under Armor All-American ... Hit .384 with five home runs as a junior ... Georgia Dugout Club Top 100 Selection.
